title: Harrison Sherpa Jacket - Beige
description:
The highly anticipated release is here; Introducing the Harrison Sherpa Jacket in Beige.

Created to provide a winter staple with an outdoor aesthetic that doesn't compromise style or sophistication. 

Constructed from high quality sherpa outing with a mesh lining for both warmth and breathability. Featuring a deep stand collar for additional warmth and a raglan sleeve design for better movement.

A contemporary jacket with a functional fit, the perfect winter piece for the ILU enthusiast. Wear over a Box Hood or style with a pair of our Slim Kobes for a completed fit. 

Male Model: 185cm (6ft) // 75kg (165lbs) // 31" Waist // Wears: Medium

Female Model: 180cm (5’11ft) Height // 32” Bust // 24” Waist // Wears: Small

Fits and Features

- Raglan sleeves with coverseam detail
- Sherpa outer
- Mesh lining
- Front zip closure with contrast strip
- Deep stand collar with contrast and grograin tape
- Chest pocket with zip and custom ILU woven label
- Lower welt pockets
- Knit bind on sleeve hem and hem
- Outer 100% Polyester
- Lining 100% Polyester

description:

title: Waffle Fisherman Beanie - Espresso
description:
A short and simple streetwear statement; the Waffle Fisherman Beanie in Espresso. 

An adaptation on the classic Fisherman Beanie with a small twist. Crafted from a chunky waffle knit that is soft to the touch, providing key warmth for the colder months. 

The thick, short style of this beanie originates from, you guessed it, fishermen. Through the unpredictable chilly weather when fishermen were on the docks or out at sea, they needed to keep their heads warm yet still be able to hear. So they would roll up their beanies above their ears, thus the inspiration behind this design.

A timeless look that ensures functionality, style and comfort. Whether you roam the coast side or stay mainland, the desire for a breathable yet warm headwear layer can be found in The Fisherman Beanie.

Fits & Features 

- One size fits all
- Short fisherman style beanie
- In double layer waffle knit
- 60% Cotton 40% Acrylic

title: ILU Copenhagen Candle
description:
The smell of fresh grass and a light breeze. A feeling of tranquility under blue skies. It’s hard to beat a day like this — the perfect day to light a candle and read your favourite book. As you think, so you shall become.

Notes: Cedar, Grapefruit, Moss, Sandalwood. 

Specifications 

- 150GM
- Hand Pored Soy Wax Candle
- 35-40 Hours of Burn Time
- Made in New Zealand

Candle Directions

When you first light your Amberjack X I Love Ugly candle, we recommend allowing the melted wax pool to reach the sides of the jar before blowing the candle out. This will help prevent tunnelling so your candle can last longer. 3 hours of burn time is recommended, and no more than 4 hours. The Candle jar will be hot during and after burning, so allow the wax to cool before handling the jar.

- Always trim wick before lighting
- Never leave candle unattended while burning
- Keep out of reach of children and pets
- Burn candle on a clear, flat surface
- Discontinue use when only 1.5 cm of wax remains

title: Obi Pant - Black
description:
As a brand, we are renowned for our unique pant silhouettes, particularly one, the Zespy Pant. Since the release of that in 2010, we have been constantly innovating, progressing and pushing the boundaries with our pant range to ensure that we have pants for everyone and every occasion.

However, it's been a while since our last style released, so we thought it was about time we introduced a brand new pant silhouette to our growing collection. Introducing the all-new, Obi Pant.

The Obi Pant was inspired by the streetwear culture and oversized fashion that circulated the late 90s to mid 2000s. A baggy and wide look with clean simplistic detailing. Made out of premium cotton and featuring custom printed buttons, YKK metal zipper, belt loops, and front and back pockets. We wanted to offer something that was comfortable yet quality, in this new silhouette.

We are proud of the end result and feel we captured the essence of classic street menswear with this garment. Style it up with our Harley Hoods and Easy Logo Tees for that quintessential streetsmart look.

Model: 185cm (6ft) // 75kg (165lbs) // 31" Waist // Wears: Medium

Fits & Features

- Wide leg
- Custom printed button at front waistband and back pockets
- Back patch pockets
- Side angled front pockets
- YKK metal zipper fly front
- Belt loops
- Fabric: 100% Cotton

A sock to lift your look whilst offering premium quality, easy movement and durability.

Please Note - Due to safe hygiene practices we can’t accept returns on Socks unless they are returned unworn, unopened and in original packaging with tags still attached. Exceptions will made should the product be received faulty or in an otherwise unsatisfactory condition.

description:

Introducing the new go-to companion to add to your wardrobe; The Slim Kobe Pant in Charcoal. A piece with inspiration drawn from Japan's simplistic, yet sophisticated streetwear landscape, a design aesthetic of huge influence to the I Love Ugly creative team.

The Slim Kobe Pant is an adaptation of the classic Kobe Pant silhouette, maintaining the cropped straight leg style with added tapering to the trouser leg to provide a more tailored, slim fit. title: Zespy Pant Mid Rise - Black
description:
An I Love Ugly staple pant that is one of our most iconic styles in our Pant Collection; Introducing the Zespy Pant Mid Rise in Black.

First introduced in 2010 after being conceptualised during travels to Amsterdam. The Zespy Pant was designed for the inquisitive mind.

The Mid Rise Zespy develops the traditional style further with the aim to provide a more functional Zespy Pant with the construction of a regular rise crotch, an innovative departure from the classic Zespy Pants famed drop-crotch.  

A pant that offers you that much desire tapered look. Pair with a Harley Hood for a laid-back fit.

A classic 6 pocked Denim Jacket with key design points to make this your winter staple.

The Empire Denim Jacket is constructed with an oversized fit, featuring custom branded shank buttons, rivets and a custom leather pouch. With custom embroidery under the back collar for that classic ILU touch.

As we wanted this garment to have that classic vintage wash, each garment has undergone a unique washing process by hand. This may cause the finished product to slightly differ from these images. 

Estelle (Image 1): 174cm (5’8ft) Height // 31” Bust // 24” Waist // Wears: XSmall

Becky (Image 2): 174cm (5'8.5ft) Height // 32" Bust // 24" Waist // Wears: Small

Design Notes 

- 6 pocket denim jacket
- Original embroidered message artwork under collar
- ILU branded custom shank buttons, rivets and leather patch
- Vintage washed denim
- Unique pocketing detail
- 100% Cotton

The Serina Cardigan has a relaxed cropped fit, designed to be a flattering yet comfortable to wear. Size up for a more oversized look.

To be styled closed or undone over our Mini Tee. The ideal knitwear piece to elevate any outfit.

Mia (Image 1): 177cm (5'10ft) Height // 31.5" Bust // 25" Waist // Wears: Small
Sydney (Image 2): 175cm (5’9ft) Height // 32” Bust // 25” Waist // Wears: Small

Design Notes
- V-neck button down
- Stretch blend with mohair and wool
- Cropped length, relaxed fit
- Bishop sleeves
- Natural look, uniquely shaped buttons
- 13% mohair, 13% wool, 26% acrylic, 43% nylon, 5% spandex

title: Xander Tailored Pant - Black
description:
A pant that epitomises elevated, yet understated everyday dressing.

The Xander Pant is a tailored workwear style that provides a timeless piece for your wardrobe. 

Featuring small subtle details such as a front pleat, the ILU embroidered logo, blind hem finishings and a double belt look that elevate this pant, in an all new fabrication for the highest standards of quality. 

Designed with the intention to be a core staple that you can turn to for seasons to come. Versatile and timeless, the Xander Pant can be paired with any tank or tee in our collection.

We recommend to take a size up if you prefer a more relaxed fit.

Georgia (Image 1): 177cm (5'10ft) Height // 32" Bust // 25" Waist // Wears: Small 
Sydney (Image 2): 175cm (5’9ft) Height // 32” Bust // 25” Waist // Wears: Small

Design Notes
- Straight leg, tailored look
- High waisted, pleat front 
- Pleat front, centre front leg crease 
- Side angled pockets at front 
- Front tucks 
- Blind hem finishing 
- Fully functional back welt pockets
- Unique belt loops 
- ILU monogram embroidery on back waistband
- V detail at centre back 
- 60% Polyester, 35% Cotton, 5% Spandex

title: Mica Wide Pant - Black
description:
The essential everyday pant; The Mica Wide Pant in Black.

Created to provide a flattering staple that can be worn for any occasion. Designed to sit lower on the waist, these wide leg pants boast a tailored look with a natural, wider fit to create the ideal silhouette.

With added front pleats and key detailing to elevate this pant into something you can turn to for any event. Style with any Tank from our collection or layer with a select from our Knitwear range.

Matilda (Image 1): 168cm (5’5ft) Height // 32.5” Bust // 23” Waist // Wears: Small
Becky (Image 3): 174cm (5'8.5ft) Height // 32" Bust // 24" Waist // Wears: Small

Design Notes

- Wide leg, tailored look
- Natural waisted
- Double front tucks
- Pleat front
- Side angled pockets
- Blind hem finishing
- Fully functional back welt pockets
- Unique belt loops
- ILU monogram embroidery below back welt pocket
- 80% Polyester, 18% Rayon, 2% Spandex
